    A class to sign any seiralizable object

    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation

                   String filenamePrivate)
                     throws NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                            IOException
        Parameters:
        filenamePublic - -- The name of the public keystore file
        filenamePrivate - -- The name of the private keystore file
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - -- A problem with the encryption service
        IOException - -- A problem writing the public or private keystores.

        public SignedObject getSignedObject(Serializable toSign)
                             throws SignatureException,
                                    NoSuchAlgorithmException,
                                    InvalidKeyException,
                                    IOException
        Parameters:
        toSign - -- The object to sign. Must be Serialzable.
        Returns:
        -- The signed object
        Throws:
        SignatureException - -- An invalid signature
        IOException - -- A problem reading the keystore
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - -- A problem with the encryption service * @throws InvalidKeySpecException
        InvalidKeyException - -- The private key is not valid
